text: feh is a lightweight image viewer aimed mainly at users of command line interfaces. Unlike most graphical image viewers, feh does not have any graphical control elements, apart from an optional file name display which enables it to also be used to display background images on systems running the X window system. feh offers four different operational modes which can be controlled via command-line flags; slideshow, thumbnail, list, and multiwindow. ==References== == See also == *Comparison of image viewers Category:Free image viewers Category:Linux image viewers
title: Feh (image viewer)
